Method Detail

isValidEmailAddress

public static boolean isValidEmailAddress(java.lang.String email)
Verifies the syntax of an e-mail address.

Parameters:
email - the email address to verify.
Returns:
true if e-mail has valid syntax.

sendMail

public static void sendMail(java.lang.String toAddress,
                            java.lang.String fromName,
                            java.lang.String fromAddress,
                            java.lang.String subject,
                            java.lang.String message,
                            java.lang.String smtpHost,
                            java.lang.String charset,
                            java.lang.String format)
                     throws EmailException
Utility method to send mail.

Parameters:
toAddress - comma separated email addresses
fromName - name of the sender
fromAddress - email address of the sender
subject - email subject
message - email message
smtpHost - valid smtp host
charset - character set of the mail like iso-8859-1 or utf-8
format - "text/plain" or "text/html"
Throws:
EmailException - if the mail could not be sent
